value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|The...land of dreams? I've never—
And...light elves?$k$pHmm...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Ah, I see you don't believe me!$k$pOnce they've grown into adults,
mortals certainly turn argumentative.
You won't listen!$k$pIt's a shame. You're so pure and
innocent as children...$k$pBut you forget how to dream so
easily... Reality IS harsh. It demands
focus, after all.$k$pAlas, it can't be helped! If you
dreamt all the time, you wouldn't
survive for long, would you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|S-so...you mean to tell me... Hm.
I'm beginning to remember now.$k$pYes... Everyone began falling asleep.
Then, I was here.$k$pBut...where is everyone else?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Ah, there the two of you are! What
is this place? Any ideas?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I'm not quite sure. But I'm glad to
see you both.$k$p...Have either of you seen any trace
of $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Where could—$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Bad news! I'm afraid the dream
may have trapped your friend...
$Nu, you said?$k$pWe have to do something about that.
And quickly—before the nightmare
does its work... This way! Hurry now!$k$p

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Ljósálfheimr is a world created
from the fabric of mortals' pleasant,
delightful dreams.$k$pIt's a world that wraps you up all
warm in a blanket, a fluffy-floaty
world—a child's dreamland.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I'm still not sure what exactly this
place is...or how we got here, but...
The scenery certainly is incredible.$k$pBut...where are all these soldiers
coming from?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Those are the soldiers of nightmares.
They're created from the anxious
and terrified thoughts of mortals.$k$pTo keep going, we'll have to do
something about the nightmares,
or they'll be sure to haunt us.$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Whew... Another victory. But still no
sign of $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I do hope everything is all right...$k$pOh! I have a great idea!$k$pHave you tried making a wish?
Something like, "I wish my friend
$Nu were here!"$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|You want me to...wish? What good
will that do?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Well, this is a dream, so...wishes
work! You can wish for whatever
you want, and it will become real!$k$pYou can do whatever you want in a
dream! Aaaanything is possible!$k$pHere, the world is whatever you
want it to be!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Huh. So...I just have to wish? How
does that work? Do I have to say
anything special? Or should I clos—$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse. You won't know until you
try. Just give it a shot! Nothing bad
can happen from a good wish.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Good point. I'll give it a try then.$k$p$EFace_Cool|I wish... I wish... I wish my friend
$Nu was here!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow! That was some good wishing!
I'm impressed.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ooh. Where... Which direction should
I be looking? Any ideas? ...This way?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$EFace_Pain|I don't think it worked.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Oh, that's too bad. It seems you've
simply lost too much of your childlike
innocence... All grown up.$k$pYou aren't able, deep in your heart,
to accept that a wish can shape this
reality... So you can't dream freely...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I...I'm sorry, everyone.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Don't worry, Alfonse. There's nothing
wrong with being an adult... We'll just
find another way!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Leave that to me! This is my home,
after all, so I know my way around.$k$pWe should visit Dream-King Freyr.
He'll be able to help! Come on, this
way. Let's go!$k$p$Sbs150|
